##### FILE: manager_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to projectsveltos/Deployment/controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: k8s-cleaner
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: k8s-cleaner
    control-plane: k8s-cleaner
  name: controller
  namespace: projectsveltos
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: k8s-cleaner
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: controller
      labels:
        control-plane: k8s-cleaner
    spec:
      containers:
      - args: null
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9440
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: healthz
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch10.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
                - ppc64le
                - s390x
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.13.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---


Mutation:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        - --log-level=debug
        name: manager

---

  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443

        - --v=0

          name: https
          protocol: TCP

            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
                - ppc64le
                - s390x
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.13.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch104.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch107.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.14.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:6789
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        - --leader-election-id=squest-operator
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch108.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
                - ppc64le
                - s390x
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.13.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:6789
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        - --leader-election-id=deep-ployment-operator
        name: manager

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch110.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
                - ppc64le
                - s390x
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.13.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch118.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch125.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.14.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch127.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
                - ppc64le
                - s390x
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.13.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---


Mutation:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch139.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch143.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 10001
          runAsUser: 10001
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:

        - --leader-elect

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch147.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch148.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=10
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy@sha256:db06cc4c084dd0253134f156dddaaf53ef1c3fb3cc809e5d81711baa4029ea4c
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch152.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.16.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch16.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.13.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

            memory: 128Mi

            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi

            - ALL

        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch173.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.16.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch181.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.16.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch185.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: operator
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
                - ppc64le
                - s390x
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8174/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.13.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8175
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8174
        - --leader-elect
        name: bpfman-operator

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch188.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch195.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
                - ppc64le
                - s390x
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.13.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch200.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.16.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch209.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.12.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch21.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
                - ppc64le
                - s390x
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.13.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch215.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch222.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.14.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch224.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
                - ppc64le
                - s390x
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.13.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

            memory: 128Mi

            memory: 64Mi

            - ALL

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch23.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.14.4
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch26.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
                - ppc64le
                - s390x
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch30.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.14.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch32.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
                - ppc64le
                - s390x
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.13.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch37.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.14.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch43.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
                - ppc64le
                - s390x
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.13.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch44.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

  template:

      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443

        - --v=0

          name: https

            memory: 128Mi

            memory: 64Mi

            - ALL

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch52.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kubelb/Deployment/kubelb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: kubelb
  namespace: kubelb
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
                - ppc64le
                - s390x
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --v=0
        image: quay.io/brancz/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.16.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --enable-leader-election
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch54.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --tls-cert-file=/etc/certs/tls/tls.crt
        - --tls-private-key-file=/etc/certs/tls/tls.key
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.13.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/certs/tls
          name: metrics-cert
          readOnly: true
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager
      volumes:
      - name: metrics-cert
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          secretName: $(METRICS_SECRET_NAME)

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch58.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.14.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch79.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch85.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.14.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:

##### FILE: manager_auth_proxy_patch86.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        name: manager

---

kind: Deployment

  name: controller-manager

  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0

          name: https

            memory: 64Mi

          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect

1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/
2 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

##### FILE: manager_command_patch_coverage.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - /antrea-mc-controller-coverage -test.run=TestBincoverRunMain -test.coverprofile=antrea-mc-controller.cov.out
          leader --config=/controller_manager_config.yaml; while true; do sleep 5
          & wait $!; done
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        image: antrea/antrea-mc-controller-coverage:latest
        name: antrea-mc-controller

---

##### FILE: manager_config_patch100.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CONTROLLER_MIMIR_API
          value: http://mimir-gateway.o11y-dev-metrics-mimir.svc.cluster.local/prometheus
        - name: CONTROLLER_CR_MIMIR_TENANT_ANNOTATION
          value: telemetry.springernature.com/o11y-tenant
        - name: CONTROLLER_CR_SELECTOR
          value: ""
        name: manager

---

##### FILE: manager_config_patch149.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: RELATED_IMAGE_RELEASE
          value: docker.io/${DOCKER_HUB_REPOSITORY}/xl-release:${APP_VERSION}
        - name: RELATED_IMAGE_RELEASE_VOLUME_PERMISSIONS
          value: docker.io/${DOCKER_HUB_REPOSITORY}/xl-release:${APP_VERSION}
        - name: RELATED_IMAGE_RELEASE_BUSY_BOX
          value: docker.io/${DOCKER_HUB_REPOSITORY}/xl-release:${APP_VERSION}
        name: manager

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: RELATED_IMAGE_DEPLOY_CENTRAL_CONFIGURATION
          value: docker.io/${DOCKER_HUB_REPOSITORY}/central-configuration:${APP_VERSION}
        - name: RELATED_IMAGE_DEPLOY_MASTER
          value: docker.io/${DOCKER_HUB_REPOSITORY}/xl-deploy:${APP_VERSION}
        - name: RELATED_IMAGE_DEPLOY_MASTER_VOLUME_PERMISSIONS
          value: docker.io/${DOCKER_HUB_REPOSITORY}/xl-deploy:${APP_VERSION}
        - name: RELATED_IMAGE_DEPLOY_WORKER
          value: docker.io/${DOCKER_HUB_REPOSITORY}/deploy-task-engine:${APP_VERSION}
        - name: RELATED_IMAGE_DEPLOY_WORKER_VOLUME_PERMISSIONS
          value: docker.io/${DOCKER_HUB_REPOSITORY}/xl-deploy:${APP_VERSION}
        - name: RELATED_IMAGE_DEPLOY_BUSY_BOX
          value: docker.io/${DOCKER_HUB_REPOSITORY}/xl-deploy:${APP_VERSION}
        name: manager

##### FILE: manager_config_patch151.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config=controller_manager_config.yaml
        name: manager
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /controller_manager_config.yaml
          name: manager-config
          subPath: controller_manager_config.yaml
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: manager-config
        name: manager-config

---

1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/
2 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/

1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

  namespace: system

  template:

        - --config=/controller_manager_config.yaml

          name: antrea-mc-controller-config

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config=controller_manager_config.yaml
        name: manager
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /controller_manager_config.yaml
          name: manager-config
          subPath: controller_manager_config.yaml
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: manager-config
        name: manager-config

---

##### FILE: manager_config_patch36.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config=controller_manager_config.yaml
        name: manager
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /controller_manager_config.yaml
          name: manager-config
          subPath: controller_manager_config.yaml
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: manager-config
        name: manager-config

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config=controller_manager_config.yaml
        name: manager
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /controller_manager_config.yaml
          name: manager-config
          subPath: controller_manager_config.yaml
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: manager-config
        name: manager-config

---

##### FILE: manager_config_patch66.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config=controller_manager_config.yaml
        name: manager
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /controller_manager_config.yaml
          name: manager-config
          subPath: controller_manager_config.yaml
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: manager-config
        name: manager-config

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config=controller_manager_config.yaml
        name: manager
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /controller_manager_config.yaml
          name: manager-config
          subPath: controller_manager_config.yaml
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: manager-config
        name: manager-config

---

##### FILE: manager_config_patch81.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config=controller_manager_config.yaml
        name: manager
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /controller_manager_config.yaml
          name: manager-config
          subPath: controller_manager_config.yaml
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: manager-config
        name: manager-config

---

          name: manager-config

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: OAKESTRA_ROOT_NETWORK_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: OAKESTRA_ROOT_NETWORK_PORT
              name: oakestra-cluster-info
        - name: CLUSTER_ID
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: CLUSTER_ID
              name: oakestra-cluster-info
        - name: OAKESTRA_ROOT_IP
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: OAKESTRA_ROOT_IP
              name: oakestra-cluster-info
        name: manager

##### FILE: manager_debug.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /go/bin/dlv
        - --continue
        - --accept-multiclient
        - --listen=:40000
        - --check-go-version=false
        - --headless=true
        - --api-version=2
        - --log=true
        - --log-output=debugger,debuglineerr,gdbwire
        - exec
        - /go/bin/manager
        - --
        - -no-leader-election
        - -zap-time-encoding=iso8601
        - -cluster-ca-secret-namespace=kong-system
        - -zap-log-level=debug
        - -enable-controller-kongplugininstallation
        - -enable-controller-konnect
        env:
        - name: GATEWAY_OPERATOR_DEVELOPMENT_MODE
          value: "true"
        name: manager
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1024Mi
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: false

---

##### FILE: manager_deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: manager
  name: manager
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: manager
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ADMIN_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: token
              name: manager-token-secret
        image: flask-manager-sample:0.0.1
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 50Mi

---

##### FILE: manager_dev.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /manager
        - -anonymous-reports=false
        - -no-leader-election
        - -zap-time-encoding=iso8601
        - -cluster-ca-secret-namespace=kong-system
        - -zap-log-level=debug
        - -zap-devel=true
        - -enable-controller-kongplugininstallation
        - -enable-validating-webhook
        - -enable-controller-konnect
        env:
        - name: GATEWAY_OPERATOR_DEVELOPMENT_MODE
          value: "true"
        name: manager
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1024Mi
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: false

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/MutatingWebhookConfiguration/mutating-webhook-configuration:
apiVersion: admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1
kind: MutatingWebhookConfiguration
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kubedns-shepherd
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: mutating-webhook-configuration
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: mutatingwebhookconfiguration
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kubedns-shepherd
  name: mutating-webhook-configuration
  namespace: default
webhooks:
- admissionReviewVersions:
  - v1
  clientConfig:
    service:
      $patch: delete
    url: https://192.168.49.3:9443/mutate-config-kubedns-shepherd-io-v1alpha1-dnsclass
  name: mdnsclass.kubedns-shepherd.io
- admissionReviewVersions:
  - v1
  clientConfig:
    service:
      $patch: delete
    url: https://192.168.49.3:9443/mutate-v1-pod
  name: mpod.kubedns-shepherd.io

kind: Namespace
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: system
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: namespace
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: system
  namespace: default

policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/system:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: system
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/system:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: system
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/system:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: system
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/system:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: system
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---

Generation completed successfully.

  namespace: system
